about.description: I'm Huda Zahra, a budding Machine Learning enthusiast and a student at NUST. I love exploring innovative ideas, building projects, and constantly pushing my learning boundaries. I'm excited about the endless possibilities that AI brings and eager to grow, collaborate, and create meaningful impact. Letâ€™s connect and build something amazing together!

projects.title: SpeechSmart
projects.description: A web application that that analyzes and improves children's pronunciation by comparing their speech to a reference sentence at the phoneme level. The platform is designed for therapists, teachers, and parents to support early speech intervention efficiently.

projects.title: Youtube Gesture Control
projects.description: Control YouTube videos using machine learning. By using the Jester dataset and training a ResNet-101 model, the system can interpret ten distinct gestures in real-time through the webcam corresponding to various video control functionalities

projects.title: Github Repos Scraper for Trend Analysis
projects.description: Scraping GitHub repositories across multiple topics using BeautifulSoup. Extract repository metadata, tags and star counts, and analyze and visualize the popularity of these tags based on the stars

projects.title: Lip Reading Model
projects.description: This project implements a Transformer-based CTC (TM-CTC) model for lipreading using pre-extracted spatio-temporal visual features from video frames. It leverages beam search decoding with a character-level language model (LM) to improve transcription accuracy on the LRS2 dataset.

projects.title: Department Dashboard
projects.description: A dashboard for the department of Software Engineering at NUST which allows students to view their grades, attendance, and other information, allows the teachers to upload grades and attendance, and allows the admin to manage the users

projects.title: CMS Notifier
projects.description: A notifier for the CMS website of NUST which notifies the user for any changes in the website

projects.title: LANGCHAIN AI BOT
projects.description: Using Langchain and FAISS vector database with MISTRAL API to use medical books for data retrieval

projects.title: Sales & Inventory Management System
projects.description: A management system to handle sales & inventory with database connectivity

projects.title: 2048 AI
projects.description: This Streamlit app simulates a robot car using Markov Decision Processes (MDPs). It uses value iteration to find the optimal policy to balance speed and overheating risk. can adjust gamma and iterations with slider

descBullets: Built scalable backend services with FastAPI and FAISS retrieval to support multi-client AI platforms.
Improved frontend UI/UX using React and TypeScript for better user experiences and client onboarding.
Automated API integrations, web scraping, and data handling workflows using n8n and other AI-driven tools.
Deployed applications with Docker, GitHub Actions, and Vercel for consistent CI/CD pipelines.
Integrated new AI technologies like Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) to enhance product capabilities.
Built and optimized secure data pipelines, integrating firewall protection and hardware acceleration for backend systems.
Enhanced database operations using PostgreSQL to support critical communication in Air Traffic Control (ATC) applications.
Streamlined backend communication layers for faster, stable, and secure network flows.
Worked with cross-functional teams on validation, deployment testing, and system security audits
Led development of a microservices-based infrastructure using the MERN stack
Integrated Firebase for real-time user authentication and backend communication in mobile apps.
Designed and tested RESTful APIs with Postman to ensure smooth frontend-backend integration.
Optimized system architecture for faster load times, improved responsiveness, and better user experience.
Conducted SEO audits and performance optimizations using Google Analytics, Google Search Console, and SEO ranking tools.
Developed content strategies to improve organic reach, increasing site visibility in targeted search results.
Implemented on-page SEO improvements, including metadata optimization, keyword structuring, and content updates.
Contributed to driving sustained growth in search engine rankings and overall web traffic.

education.title: Bachelor of Engineering in Software Engineering
education.name: National University of Sciences & Technology (NUST)
